content.query:
select COUNT_BIG(*), 'call_center' from call_center union
select count(*), 'catalog_page' from catalog_page union
select count(*), 'catalog_returns' from catalog_returns union
select count(*), 'catalog_sales' from catalog_sales union
select count(*), 'customer' from customer union
select count(*), 'customer_address' from customer_address union
select count(*), 'customer_demographics' from customer_demographics union
select count(*), 'date_dim' from date_dim union
select count(*), 'household_demographics' from household_demographics union
select count(*), 'income_band' from income_band union
select count(*), 'inventory' from inventory union
select count(*), 'item' from item union
select count(*), 'promotion' from promotion union
select count(*), 'reason' from reason union
select count(*), 'ship_mode' from ship_mode union
select count(*), 'store' from store union
select count(*), 'store_returns' from store_returns union
select count(*), 'store_sales' from store_sales union
select count(*), 'time_dim' from time_dim union
select count(*), 'warehouse' from warehouse union
select count(*), 'web_page' from web_page union
select count(*), 'web_returns' from web_returns union
select count(*), 'web_sales' from web_sales union
select count(*), 'web_site' from web_site
